mapper.select: select t_user.Id,UserName,`Password`,RealName,Sex,TelPhone,Email,UserRoleTypeId,t_user.CreateDate,t_user.UserStateId from t_user,t_userrole where t_user.Id=t_userrole.UserId and (UserName= #{loginName} OR TelPhone=#{loginName} OR Email=#{loginName}) AND Password=(#{loginPassword})

SELECT * FROM t_user WHERE t_user.Id in ( SELECT t_userrole.UserId FROM t_userrole WHERE t_userrole.UserRoleTypeId = 1 ) ORDER BY t_user.Id DESC LIMIT #{start},#{limit}
